Articles.Content:
Wow this community seems very big. Im so happy I bought this game, I hope to share it with some friends and family. I have a question though. How do I register my copy of Kerbal Space Program, if I bought it on steam? I have looked for an option in the main page but I think I am missing something.

Thanks in advance! And as I read a lot around here. Fly safe!

You have bought the steam version wich is identical to the one being sold on this site.

You don't have to register it on this site.
Thank you very much MK3424. Cheers
As previously stated you do not have to register it on the KSP Store, the Steam version is the same. Just want to say hello and welcome to the forums! Hope you enjoy it here!!!
Wow great welcome I feel like I wont be the only one in space! thank you very much for the warm welcome.
